This article needs additional citations for verification. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. (December 2016) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)
This article relies too much on references to primary sources. Please improve this by adding secondary or tertiary sources. (December 2017) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)

This is a list of Christmas markets from around the world.

Christmas markets are listed using their unique name. The list is ordered by continent and then by country.

Contents

Worldwide Christmas markets[edit]

Europe[edit]

Austria[edit]

Rathaus in Vienna and Christkindlmarkt in front of it.
  • Christkindlmarkt – Innsbruck, Tyrol[1]
  • Christkindlmarkt – Salzburg, Salzburg[2]
  • Christkindlmarkt – Vienna, Vienna[3]
  • Christkindlmarkt – Villach, Carinthia[4]
  • Weihnachtsmarkt – Salzburg, Salzburg[5]

Belgium[edit]

  • Plaisirs d'hiver – Winterpret – Winter Wonders – Brussels[6]
  • Village de Noël de Liège – Liège[7]
  • Bruges Christmas Market – Bruges[8]

Bosnia and Herzegovina[edit]

  • Sarajevo Holiday Market – Sarajevo[9]

Bulgaria[edit]

  • Deutscher Weihnachtsmarkt Sofia

Czech Republic[edit]

  • Vanocni trh – Prague[10]
  • Vanocni trhy – Brno[11]

Denmark[edit]

  • Christianias Julemarked – Christianshavn/Christiania, Copenhagen
  • Jul i Den Gamle By – The Old Town, Aarhus[12]
  • Tivolis Julemarked – Inner City, Copenhagen
  • Fields Jule by – Fields Shopping Center Copenhagen Ørestad )

England[edit]

Hyde Park Winter Wonderland Christmas Market, London.
  • Bath Christmas Market – Bath Abbey Courtyard and various other locations around Bath
  • Beverley Festival of Christmas – Beverley Town Centre, East Yorkshire
  • Birmingham Christmas Market and Craft Fair – Chamberlain Square and Centenary Square, Birmingham
  • Bristol Christmas Market – City Centre, Bristol
  • Chester Christmas Market – City Centre & Winter Wonderland @ Chester Racecourse Chester
  • Deepdale Christmas Market – Dalegate Market, Burnham Deepdale, north Norfolk coast[13]
  • Exeter Christmas Market – Cathedral Green, Exeter[14]
  • Frankfurt Christmas Market – Victoria Square and New Street, Birmingham[15]
  • Frankfurt Christmas Market – Millennium Square, Leeds[16]
  • Lincoln Christmas Market – Lincoln[17]
  • Liverpool Christmas Market – Liverpool[18]
  • Bankside Winter Market – Bankside, London
  • Cologne Christmas Market at Southbank Centre (from Cologne) – Bankside, London
  • Hyde Park Winter Wonderland Christmas Market – Hyde Park, London[19]
  • Manchester Christmas Markets – Manchester[20][21]
  • Newcastle Christmas Markets – Grey's Monument, Newcastle upon Tyne[22]
  • Victorian Festival of Christmas – Portsmouth Historic Dockyard, Portsmouth[23]
  • Winchester Cathedral Christmas Market – Winchester, Hampshire
  • The Winter Forest – Broadgate, London[24]

  • Tallinn Christmas Market – Tallinn

  • Christmas Market, Nantes, Pays de la Loire[34]
  • Christmas Market, Sélestat, Alsace[35]
  • Christkindelsmärik – Strasbourg, Alsace[36]
  • Village de Noël (Christmas Village), Reims, Champagne[37]
  • Christmas Market, Valbonne, Alpes Maritimes[38]

Romania[edit]

  • Christmas Market – Bucharest[82]
  • Christmas Market (Târgul de Crăciun) – Sibiu, Sibiu County – 18 November to 3 January[83]
Sibiu Christmas Market 2012
